qas.question: When did African states become independent?
Who offered many Africans a chance to study in their country?
How many students moved from Africa to Russia?
Why did students move to Russia?
Migration to Russia continued into many countries where?

context: As African states became independent in the <a0_0>1960s<a0_0/>, the <a1_0>Soviet Union<a1_0/> offered many of their citizens the chance to study in Russia. Over a period of 40 years, <a2_0>about 400,000<a2_0/> African students from various countries moved to Russia <a3_0>to pursue higher studies<a3_0/>, including many Black Africans. This extended beyond the Soviet Union to many countries of the <a4_0>Eastern bloc.
